home.notes: Previous CLS issue in PatientEducationVideos resolved with Skeleton. LCP optimized with CSS gradient hero. DoctorCard image has priority.

location.notes: Static generation used. Map component uses facade pattern.

bottleneck_identified.description: PatientEducationVideos component was lazy-loaded with a generic placeholder (h-[1700px] md:h-[600px]) that did not match the grid layout of the actual content, causing layout shifts when the component loaded.

fix_implemented.description: Created high-fidelity `PatientEducationVideosSkeleton` mirroring the grid structure (header, 3 cards with aspect-video images) and applied it to both `dynamic` import loading prop and `LazySection` placeholder in `app/page.tsx`.
fix_implemented.expected_impact: Eliminates layout shift when PatientEducationVideos loads, as the skeleton occupies the exact same space and layout as the final content.
fix_implemented.verification: Visual verification using Playwright screenshot confirmed the skeleton matches the component layout. Build and tests passed.
